hrīḥ śrīr dhṛtis tathā kīrtir | HV_App.I,29A.37a
hrīḥ śrīr lakṣmīḥ svadhā medhā | HV_App.I,24.21a
hvasvā alpāyuṣaś caiva | *HV_31.148*482B:3a
